verses.verse: In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites<s%> was <S%H1245>seeking<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for themselves to <S%H3427>live<s%> in, for <S%H5704>until<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> had not been <S%H5307>allotted<s%> to them as a <S%H5159>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> from their <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> out of their <S%H7098>whole<s%> <S%H7098>number,<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol,<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> and to <S%H2713>search<s%> it; and they <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H2713>search<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>" And they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

When they were <S%H5973>near<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> they <S%H5234>recognized<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite;<s%> and they <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4310>"Who<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> you <S%H1988>here<s%>? And <S%H4100>what<s%> are you <S%H6213>doing<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> [place?] And <S%H4100>what<s%> do you have <S%H6311>here<s%>?"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H2090>"Thus<s%> and <S%H2088>so<s%> has <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> to me, and he has <S%H7936>hired<s%> me, and I <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> his <S%H3548>priest.<s%>"

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7592>"Inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4994>please,<s%> that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> whether our <S%H1870>way<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> we are <S%H1980>going<s%> will be <S%H6743>prosperous.<s%>"

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H1980>"Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace;<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you are <S%H1980>going<s%> has the Lord's <S%H5227>approval.<s%>"

Then the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3919>Laish<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were in it <S%H3427>living<s%> in <S%H983>security,<s%> after the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> <S%H8252>quiet<s%> and <S%H982>secure;<s%> for <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3423>ruler<s%> <S%H6114><s%> <S%H3637>humiliating<s%> [them] for <S%H1697>anything<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they were <S%H7350>far<s%> from the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%> and <S%H369>had<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1697>dealings<s%> with <S%H120>anyone.<s%>

When they <S%H935>came<s%> back to their <S%H251>brothers<s%> at <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol,<s%> their <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>"What<s%> [do] you [report?]"

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> and let us <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> them; for we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%> And will you <S%H2814>sit<s%> <S%H2814>still<s%>? Do not <S%H6101>delay<s%> to <S%H1980>go,<s%> to <S%H935>enter,<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

"When you <S%H935>enter,<s%> you shall <S%H935>come<s%> to a <S%H982>secure<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> with a <S%H7342>spacious<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4270>lack<s%> of <S%H3605>anything<s%> <S%H1697><s%> that is on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

Then from the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites,<s%> from <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and from <S%H847>Eshtaol,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2296>armed<s%> with <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out.

And they <S%H5927>went<s%> up and <S%H2583>camped<s%> at Kiriath-jearim in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> Mahaneh-dan to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H310>west<s%> of Kiriath-jearim.
And they <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah.<s%>

Then the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H3919>Laish<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to their <S%H251>kinsmen,<s%> "Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3426>there<s%> are in <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> an <S%H646>ephod<s%> and <S%H8655>household<s%> <S%H8655>idols<s%> and a <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image<s%> and a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H4541>image<s%>? <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, <S%H3045>consider<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> you should <S%H6213>do.<s%>"

And they <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> and <S%H7592>asked<s%> him of his <S%H7965>welfare.<s%>

And the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2296>armed<s%> with their <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> by the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

Now the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up [and] <S%H935>entered<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> [and] <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image<s%> and the <S%H646>ephod<s%> and <S%H8655>household<s%> <S%H8655>idols<s%> and the <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H4541>image,<s%> while the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> by the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> with the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2296>armed<s%> with <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war.<s%>

And when <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into Micah's <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image,<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> and <S%H8655>household<s%> <S%H8655>idols<s%> and the <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H4541>image,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>"What<s%> are you <S%H6213>doing<s%>?"

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Be <S%H2790>silent,<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and <S%H1980>come<s%> with us, and be to us a father and a <S%H1>priest.<s%> Is it <S%H3548>better<s%> for you to be a <S%H2896>priest<s%> to the <S%H3548>house<s%> of <S%H1004>one<s%> <S%H259>man,<s%> <S%H376>or<s%> to be <S%H176>priest<s%> to a <S%H3548>tribe<s%> and a <S%H7626>family<s%> in <S%H4940>Israel<s%>?"

And the priest's <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H3190>glad,<s%> and he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> and <S%H8655>household<s%> <S%H8655>idols<s%> and the <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H1980>departed,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>ones<s%> and the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and the <S%H3520>valuables<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of them.

When they had <S%H7368>gone<s%> <S%H7368>some<s%> <S%H7368>distance<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] in the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H5973>near<s%> Micah's <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2199>assembled<s%> and <S%H1692>overtook<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>

And they <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> who <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H6440>around<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is [the matter] with you, that you have <S%H2199>assembled<s%> <S%H2199>together<s%>?"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "You have <S%H3947>taken<s%> away my <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>made,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and have <S%H1980>gone<s%> away, and <S%H4100>what<s%> do I have <S%H5750>besides<s%>? So <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H2088><s%> can you <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H4100>'What<s%> is [the matter] with you?'"

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Do not let your <S%H6963>voice<s%> be <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> us, <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H4751>fierce<s%> <S%H5315><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon you and you <S%H622>lose<s%> your <S%H5315>life,<s%> with the <S%H5315>lives<s%> of your <S%H1004>household.<s%>"

So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> on their <S%H1870>way;<s%> and when <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> for him, he <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H7725>went<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Then they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H1961>belonged<s%> to him, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3919>Laish,<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8252>quiet<s%> and <S%H982>secure,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and they <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> [them,] <S%H3588>because<s%> it was <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> and they <S%H369>had<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1697>dealings<s%> with <S%H120>anyone,<s%> and it was in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is near Beth-rehob. And they <S%H1129>rebuilt<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in it.

And they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> their father <S%H1>who<s%> was <S%H834>born<s%> in <S%H3205>Israel;<s%> <S%H3478>however,<s%> the <S%H199>name<s%> of the <S%H8034>city<s%> <S%H5892>formerly<s%> was <S%H7223>Laish.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> up for themselves the <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image;<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> he and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H3548>priests<s%> to the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H1540>captivity<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

So they <S%H7760>set<s%> up for themselves Micah's <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6213>made,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>time<s%> that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was at <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>
